name: Quenton's Quest
description:
Quenton's Quest:

Quenton, a young and humble duckster, has been given a mission: to rescue Princess Pea from the castle in which she has been trapped. Can you fight off the guards in each room with the trusty banana sword?

Instructions:

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move Quenton.

Avoid the tomato bullets being shot by the guards, and left click on the enemies to attack them. Proceed to the next stage through the door!

Studio Quanana:

Art by:

April Gong

Code by:

 Sohan Alleshwaram and Angelina Chen

Special thanks to our COSMOS Cluster 5 2021 instructors and classmates!
